data.text: Today I'm going to talk about one particular word in terms of reduction. Reduction is when

data.text: a sound is dropped or changed in a word, and this happens quite frequently in unaccented

data.text: syllables. The word today is the word 'for'. The word 'for' reduces to fer, fer. Very quick:

translation.text: âm tiết. Từ hôm nay là từ 'cho'. Từ 'for' giảm thành fer, fer. Rất nhanh:

data.text: F, and then the schwa/R sound. Fer, fer. It will then link to the word that follows. Fer,

translation.text: F, và sau đó là âm thanh schwa / R. Fer, Fer. Sau đó nó sẽ liên kết với từ theo sau. Fer,

data.text: for, fer. Example: I got it for you. I got it for you, fer, fer, fer you. I got it for

data.text: you. More examples: Can I have this cake? No, it's for tonight. Fer, fer, it's for tonight.

translation.text: bạn. Ví dụ khác: Tôi có thể có chiếc bánh này? Không, đó là cho tối nay. Fer, Fer, tối nay.

data.text: I bike for transportation, not for fitness. Fer, fer. One more time: I bike for transportation,
